short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily add AI music to the Totally Real Music app, straight from YouTube!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest way to add videos of AI generated music to the Totally Real Music app.

1) Browse YouTube for the video you want
2) Select its language and music genre
3) Click to add the video

To download the Totally Real Music app, please visit:
https://www.totallyrealmusic.com/

It's that simple!

Please remember to only add AI-generated music, all other videos will be removed.
